title: Brett Favre Interview, Coaching Moves, College Championship Recap (Football 01/10)
description:
Nick Kostos, Will Brinson and Jason La Canfora together for a midweek edition of the Pick Six podcast! The crew reacts to the National Championship Game and some unpopular Tweets from missing regular Pete Prisco. Then, Nick, Will and Jason break down some coaching situations across the league including a hire in Chicago, a possible swap between Green Bay and Baltimore, potential assistants leaving Philadelphia and much more. Next, legendary NFL quarterback Brett Favre joins Will Brinson to discuss his reaction to Bama-Georgia and Nick Saban's quarterback switch. Then, the former Packers great discusses the state of the franchise amidst turnover in the Green Bay coaching staff and front office, along with another former team of his, the Vikings. Favre also teases an upcoming documentary he is involved in regarding concussions and the state of the issue across the sport, before breaking down how he think his buddy Jon Gruden will fare with the Raiders.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
